content: ETF Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 06 Apr 2019Should investors be concerned with the relative low liquidity of ETFS on SGX? Anything investors can do about it?1 answerAnswerBump0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Apr 2019Not a big deal but not a great thing too. Nothing much we can do about it. You can try to invest in overseas ETFs which have more variety and better liquidity.0 comments0
